name: chai-openapi-response-validator

0.2.0.name: chai-openapi-response-validator
0.2.0.description: Simple Chai support for asserting that HTTP responses satisfy an OpenAPI spec

scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=html && nyc check-coverage --statements 95 --branches 95 --functions 95 --lines 95
scripts.test:full: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:mutation

scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=html && nyc check-coverage --statements 100 --branches 100 --functions 100 --lines 100
scripts.test:full: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:mutation
